projects.title: The fall of Icarus
projects.subtitle: #React #Parallax #Storytelling
projects.text: The tale of Daedalus and his son Icarus. In this project you see the tragedy unfolding as you scroll.
projects.description: The tragedy of Daedalus and his son who flew too close to the sun. You see the tragedy unfold live as you are scrolling.

projects.title: Bossies Wijnbar
projects.subtitle: #Tailwind css #Brand Design
projects.description: My dad and I started a wine bar together in 2022. This website tells our story and information.

projects.title: A Samurai Story
projects.subtitle: #React #Framer #Spring
projects.description: Hanakotobo is the symbolism that flowers carry in Japan. Trough that symbolism you follow a samurai's life story.

creativeWork.title: SKETCHBOOK
creativeWork.subtitle: During the past years I've filled up many sketchbooks. In the selection underneath you'll find a selection I made to showcase a variety of the work. The sketches in my sketchbooks usually never take more than 15-20 minutes.
